books.title: NodeJs
books.author: Ashish Yadav
books.description:
Node.js is an open-source, cross-platform JavaScript runtime environment that allows you to run JavaScript on the server side.

 Built on Google Chrome’s V8 JavaScript engine

 Enables building fast, scalable, and event-driven server-side applications

Uses non-blocking I/O and asynchronous programming, ideal for real-time apps like chat servers or APIs

books.title: MongoDB
books.author: Ashish Yadav
books.description:
MongoDB is a NoSQL, document-oriented database used for storing high-volume data in a flexible, JSON-like format.

Instead of tables and rows (like SQL), MongoDB uses collections and documents.
Built for scalability, performance, and developer agility.
Data is stored in BSON (Binary JSON) format.

chapters.title: Introduction to MongoDB
chapters.description: Understand what MongoDB is, why it's used, and its NoSQL document-oriented nature.

chapters.title: Installing MongoDB
chapters.description: Steps to install MongoDB locally and start the MongoDB server.
chapters.code:
// On Windows/Mac/Linux
mongod --dbpath=/data/db

chapters.title: MongoDB Shell Basics
chapters.description: Basic commands in the MongoDB shell: creating DB, inserting and querying documents.
chapters.code:
use myDatabase

db.users.insertOne({ name: 'Alice', age: 25 })
db.users.find({ age: { $gt: 20 } })

chapters.description: Perform Create, Read, Update, and Delete operations on MongoDB collections.

chapters.description: Use the native MongoDB driver to connect your Node.js app to MongoDB.

chapters.description: Use Mongoose ODM to model MongoDB data in Node.js applications.

chapters.title: Aggregation and Indexing

books.title: Tailwind CSS
books.author: Ashish Yadav
books.description:
Tailwind CSS is a utility-first CSS framework that provides low-level, atomic classes to build modern user interfaces directly in your HTML or JSX.

Unlike frameworks like Bootstrap, Tailwind does not provide prebuilt components. Instead, you create custom designs using composable utility classes.
